chatbot into our existing static website. The chatbot should answer basic questions about
our products or services using a pre-trained language model, such as OpenAI's GPT-3.5 or a
similar API. The integration should feature a user-friendly chat window on the website,
enabling seamless user interaction. This project aligns with the trending use case of
leveraging AI agents for customer support and engagement.
